title: Yichen Liu
text:
Hi there!
My name is Yichen Liu. I’m currently a Master student in Data Science at Georgetown University. I hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Engineering from Virginia Tech, where he focused in Control Robotics & Autonomy and Networking & Cybersecurity.
